title: What is the Jio 5G creation module? - Quora

response.answer_text: The entire 5G stack is built in-India by Jio Employees and is ready to roll-out as soon as the spectrum is available. This Made-in-India 5G solution will be ready for trials as soon as the 5G spectrum is available… and can be ready for field deployment next year. And because of JIO's converged, all-IP network architecture… we can easily upgrade our 4G network to 5G. Once Jio's 5G solution is proven at India-scale, Jio Platforms would be well-positioned to be an exporter of 5G solutions to other telecom operators globally, as a complete managed service. 5G connected drones will help farmersProactive Medical CareBlazing Fast Internet Spee
